author: Fred Charlet
description: This bittersweet aperitif-style drink’s light green hue and garnish befits its name and uses the tried and tested combo of gentian, gin and lemon juice.
name: Dans Le Jardin (In The Garden)
recipeIngredient: 40 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into ice-filled glass
